thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 11 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Vanfund Urban Investment and Development signs LoI to sell 70 pct stake in fund management firm

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Vanfund Urban Investment and Development signs LoI to sell 70 pct stake in fund management firm

organizations.name: vanfund urban investment and development co ltd

text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Vanfund Urban Investment and Development Co Ltd :
* Says it signed Letters of letter of intent (LoI) to sell 70 percent stake in its fund management unit
* Details remain undetermined
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/ZUDDL2
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
